name: Work Orders in Progress
query:
SELECT
  `tabWork Order`.name as "Work Order:Link/Work Order:150",
  `tabWork Order`.creation as "Date:Date:95",
  `tabWork Order`.production_item as "Item Code:Link/Item:100",
  `tabWork Order`.item_name as "Item Name:Data:150",
  `tabWork Order`.stock_uom as "UOM:Link/UOM:50",
  `tabWork Order`.qty as "To Produce:Float:100",
  `tabWork Order`.produced_qty as "Produced:Float:100",
  `tabWork Order`.process_loss_qty as "Process Loss:Float:100",
  `tabWork Order`.company as "Company:Link/Company:"
FROM
  `tabWork Order`
WHERE
  `tabWork Order`.docstatus=1
  AND `tabWork Order`.status != 'Stopped'
  AND ifnull(`tabWork Order`.produced_qty, 0) + ifnull(`tabWork Order`.process_loss_qty, 0) < `tabWork Order`.qty
  AND EXISTS (SELECT name from `tabStock Entry` where work_order =`tabWork Order`.name)
